attributes.action: Call for removing of Asylum Seeker Benefits and Entitlements in the UK
attributes.additional_details: The UK and its citizens are struggling with the cost of living, housing shortages, and access to services. It’s only fair that the welfare system prioritises those who contribute to it. This petition seeks fairness, transparency, and sustainability
attributes.background: Remove the financial support &  housing given to asylum seekers, ensuring it reflects only essential needs and does not exceed what British citizens receive under welfare. Introduce time limits post-refusal and publish regular cost reports.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Stop financial and other support for asylum seekers
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/705383
